onSuccess.displayText:
The right path, it seemed, was unfortunately the wrong one to tread.

{Player} soon found himself surrounded by dangerous snakes, some of which lunged at him with venomous fangs. Only sheer luck and quick reflexes spared him from a deadly bite, though the experience left him shaken. After what felt like an eternity navigating through the writhing mass of serpents, he finally stumbled upon a familiar sight, the fork where his journey had begun.

Breathing a sigh of relief, {Player} realized that his misstep had brought him back to where it all started. But now, there was only one path left to take.
